TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CompositingMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how the source colors are combined with the background colors.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode SourceCopy = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that when a color is rendered, it overwrites the background color.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode SourceOver = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that when a color is rendered, it is blended with the background color. The blend is determined by the alpha component of the color being rendered.
